articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Amazon’s new Alexa+ feature adds conversational AI to Ring doorbells - TechCrunch
articles.description: Amazon said that the feature uses the Ring doorbell's video descriptions to determine who the person in front of the camera is based on their uniform, actions, and what they are holding.
articles.content: Amazon is adding a new feature to Alexa+ that adds a conversational AI to Ring doorbells, letting users manage deliveries, turn down sales folks, and let family or friends leave a message when they a… [+1961 chars]
